item.description:
Bite-Me combines an epic battle of survival between Humans, Vampires, Werewolves, and Zombies with hilarious quirky artwork, cheesy puns, and strategy for the ultimate card game.

Turn other players into Vampires, Zombies, or Werewolves and then kill them. Slay one of each type of Monster and you win! Watch Out, others will be attacking you. Don’t get bitten or you turn into a Monster and start biting others. Plot your strategy to use magical objects, spells, and weapons to battle Monsters, defend yourself, or become human again.

There are six types of cards in the Bite-Me Deck. (Infection, Attack, Protection, Regeneration, Strength, and Movement cards). Many cards are specific to a species (Human, Vampire, Werewolf, Zombie). You can try to turn other players into a monster with an infection card. Use attack cards to try and kill another players. You can protect yourself from an infection or an attack with the right protection card. Turn back to Human or regain a life with right regeneration card. Make yourself stronger or others weaker with Strength cards. Change direction or skip players with Movement cards.

Each player starts the game as a Human. Each player will probably change species several times during a game. When a player attacks another with an attack card, it is a battle to survive. Think of the old card game war. If you are attacked with a level 1 attack card, you can fight back with a higher level attack card. This goes on until a player wins or a protection card is played. If you do not have a higher level attack or protection card, you die and your opponent get credit for killing your type of monster. Strength cards can add +1 to your cards or can lower your opponent’s cards for one turn. The other type of battle in Bite-Me is called an Alpha Battle. This happens each time more than one player becomes the same monster type. IE when a second person is turned into a Vampire. The victor is the Alpha and takes a card from the loser. They both continue with +1 and -1 cards until they turn into another species. Kill each monster type and be human or be the last surviving player and you WIN!

—description from the publisher
